casebody.data:
Smock et al., Appellants, v. Hall et al.; Motorists Mutual Insurance Company, Appellee.

[Cite as Smock v. Hall (2000), 87 Ohio St.3d 1250.]

(No. 99-461 Submitted December 15, 1999 Decided February 2, 2000.) Glowacki & Associates Co., L.P.A, James L. Glowacki and Tammy G. Gibson, for appellants. *1251Thrasher, Dinsmore & Dolan, David E. Lowe and Heidi M. Cisan, for appellee.

The appeal is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently allowed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
